scope_of_work.scope:
Admin
Writing FSPs
Administration of access permits & permits to work
Access control, badging and induction of consultants and contractors

Attendance
Attendance and input at design sign-off stage
Escorting (Non-Critical Environments)
Escorting (Critical Environments)
Attendance at familiarization sessions
Attendance of witness tests
Accompanying consultants to establish building layout and existing technical installation
Administration of permits to work & access permits

Project Management
Job Punch List
Single Source / Competitive Bid Approval / BAFO Savings
Health & Safety Form (EPIC Form)
O&M Manuals
EANS/CMMS Update (Only for more than 10 assets)
As Built Drawing Reviews
Co-ordination of communications with other groups
Co-ordination of project communications
Co-ordination of Move Teams
Liaison with Landlord’s Agent / Landlord regarding FM & Project related licences and permits
Liaison between cleaning team and project activities
Liaison between security and project activities
Provision and co-ordination of temporary signage
Building closure activities, e.g. furniture removal, shipping. Liaison with stores
Update to Maximo ref PPM requirements

Supervision
Site Review of FSPs
Supervision of isolation and/or reinstatement
Supervision in sensitive areas

scope_of_work.problem: Covid-19 Preventative Tier 2 Cleaning requested by Client
scope_of_work.scope: Services are designed to create a visually clean environment and reduce but not eliminate the risks of spreading infectious disease and viruses. While the Enhanced Cleaning Services will align with the most current recommendations and guidelines on environmental cleaning published by the Centers for Disease Control (CDC), World Health Organization (WHO) and Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), there is no guarantee that the services will eliminate the risks of spreading infectious disease and viruses.
scope_of_work.justification: To mitigate the risk of Covid 19 and other diseases in the buildings.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Site would not be following the current recommendations outlined by the CDC and OSHA for Covid 19 cleaning.
